website_summaries.verdict: The KEEN Saltzman Waterproof proved that it was not only suitable for hiking, but it can also deliver well in other outdoor activities. It was also appreciated with its provision of comfort, protection, and traction.However, it still was not able to please everyone. All in all, the KEEN Saltzman WP is a good pair of hiking shoes for those who do not mind having extra weight on their foot.
pros: Aside from hiking, the KEEN Saltzman WP was also a good shoe for playing disc golf, based on plenty of customer reviews
This shoe gripped well on different grounds, according to numerous users
Several wearers testified to the comfort delivered by the Saltzman WP
This hiking shoe was slightly expensive but all worth it, as stated by a handful of satisfied online purchasers
The waterproofing of the KEEN Saltzman WP kept many wearers’ feet dry
An abundance of Keen loyalists testified that it runs true to size
cons: A few users were dismayed with its hefty weight
The sole was a bit stiff, according to a horde of disheartened hikers

customer_reviews.title: Keen but not as good as previous pairs
customer_reviews.text: Like most products nowadays, it seems like the quality has gone down with Keen. I had bought a similar pair two years ago that lasted a solid two years before becoming my "construction" shoes (retired from regular use but still ok for cutting the grass and anything else that destroys shoes). These shoes, however, lasted less than a year before the toe became unglued, and the wear on the footpad is pretty heavy. The waterproofing worked well, and other than falling apart way too early they were a good shoe, but I've since gone to a competitors shoe, and will see how they fare. Bye Keen.
customer_reviews.author: David M Golnick

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR DAILY USE.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fine for hiking in wet terrain but for any other purpose they kind of suck. They do not breath AT ALL. I sit at a desk all day and the lack of air flow has led to athletes foot and odor issues. I have never had this problem in the past even with other Keens. They are well built and everything else about them is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: B. Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for hours, they're so comfortable. They fit perfectly I really like them. I've now owned them 8 months, from Feb to Oct. and both shoes started to leak. Where the sole meets the shoe, in the bend, pulled away from the material and water pours in even in wet grass. Disappointed. Will try another model.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected however Keens quality seems to be lacking with this shoe. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, just because I wanted a different color. These are very durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and folding up well for 3 months now including weeks of hiking in Yellowstone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are heavy and after an 8 mile walk my feet were killing me. Never will I buy these shoes again!
customer_reviews.author: DSFX3

customer_reviews.title: Heavy. Almost too heavy to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: VERY heavy for a shoe. I'm almost considering returning it. Fits good though.
customer_reviews.author: erichfrazer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived on time. They fit as expected. They are my second pair of Keens and in my job they work great and last me a year that is good in the landscaping I do for work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Keen quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is a little heavier than I expected, other than that, very comfortable. You can tell that it has the keen quality as I expected it would have.
customer_reviews.author: James Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing!! Felt broke in from day 1 Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, light and comfortable. Waterproof only lasts a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Horath

customer_reviews.title: The shoe failed before it wore out.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase at first. It was comfortable and the ankle portions of the shoe were not too high and bothersome for me. The problem came when some parts of the sole (those little gray slits of rubber) started separating from the rest of the sole. Things like walking on a gravel driveway became bothersome then because there was not much of a barrier between my feet and the rocks. Water resistance went out the window at that point as well. These were good shoes originally but they simply failed long before they should have.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: shoe sole cracked after few years
customer_reviews.text: All perfect except sole. Soles technicalaly is crap, cracked in bend position in sole parts edges, after few years of non hard use. i wear them without winter and snow condition - and they soles just cracked - very sad. Dear Keen. Please, make good quality long lives soles and lace holders from textile (sandals and some shoes). Trying to repair it with shoe glue - no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kirill

customer_reviews.title: Insane price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, but $189?! You folks at Keen must be high!
customer_reviews.author: Den Meck

product_meta.title: KEEN Men's Saltzman Wp-m Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: A fast, flexible hiking shoe in waterproof mesh—exactly what you want when the weather's iffy. The springy midsole provides long-lasting cushioning, while the webbed overlay amps up the support.
